channel.title: Blender on Christian Mahnke
channel.description: Recent content in Blender on Christian Mahnke

item.title: Climate change in art...
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: …is “old news” by now: Neither when it comes to the effects that can be recognised in old works, nor as an object of art itself.

item.title: 3D Models in the browser
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: Maybe it will become a virtual exhibition about orange ceramics…

item.title: Hang pictures in Sweet Home 3D
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: For the planning of an exhibition using a 3D program, I have been looking into how pre-arranged picture frames could be imported into Sweet Home 3D…
